Title: Ask Any Girl
Actors: David Niven, Shirley MacLaine, Gig Young, Rod Taylor
Plot: When Meg Wheeler, a naive young girl, goes to big city looking for a husband she lands a job in a marketing firm run by brothers Miles and Evan Doughton. She convinces stodgy Miles to market her as a potential wife to playboy Evan. Miles plays Pygmalion.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.
